replies.body: Missed a great opportunity to call it Spookong.

Too many perfect opportunities, wasted.

Another example: Popst{{champion:103}}
logged in to upvote

{{champion:120}}  I'm a Grandfather?
HIS TALE!!! HIS TALE!!!!
His story, his story? Huh?
Ok riot now where is SATAN {{champion:17}}
In hell, with all the other Teemo players.
Well played sir, well played indeed.

satan skin lol
{{champion:17}}
Lil devil skin{{champion:17}} just like cupid on smite yo!
smite eh ...DONT EVER TALK ABOUT SMITE >:(
Its a skin now.... man were you really asking for this 2 years ago?
{{champion:16}}  Come here. I got a Banana for you.
Giggity?
Giggity.
Monkey see, Monkey buy.
Unfortunately, the splash art is infinitely more credible than the actual skin in-game. Again, that's just my opinion, but I'm just slightly disappointed.
Yea your right i wish it did have more of a wow in game but at least the particles look nice i just wish the texture was better like how blitz looks now{{champion:53}}
...That's Definitely Not Blitzcrank.
I wasn't satisfied with the skin either. The splash art was gorgeous, but what really killed the skin for me, was the recall. I feel they could have done much better with it.
Its a good day for wukong mains across the world

Unfortunately, I gotta say that I am less than impressed. This skin concept is just so... plain. The staff looks like he had two different thresh lanterns that were stretched and put on each end, he isnt even really wearing anything on his torso... The leggings are cool and the left arm gauntlet looks nice, but I gotta say He just looks plain.

The axe tail thing was a huge turnoff for me. It just looks WRONG; the monkey king with an axe tail? I would have gladly accepted spikes or maybe even a barbed hook tail, but an AXE? No... stick to the staff and build on it; its his iconic weapon. 

The beard looks a little silly. He's a monkey. With a beard. Think about that for a moment.

I've been waiting for a good wukong skin myself, but this simply isnt it. I am dissapointed.

2/10 would not buy.

I like the axe tail. It is a reference to the story "The Pit and the Pendulum" by Edgar Allen Poe. The pendulum in the story is often depicted like a blade, similar to the one Wukong has on his tail in this skin

*"...to reveal gleaming emerald eyes."* ??? In the splash art, they are blue...
....Details Maine, details
{{champion:13}} +{{champion:412}} = Underworld{{champion:62}}
Wukong Skin! 2+year of Waiting
The undead monkey king shall reign
Jade-dragon with dumbo hair and spookiness. I think I'll pass on this one for my main :P

For those of you confused it states the skin is on sale for 975 till 10/28/14. Then it goes to its normal 1350 price until 11/4/14. After that you will likely have to wait a full year before it becomes available again.

***"before going into the Legacy Vault on November 4."***

Did this skin will be avalaible at 2016 harrowing sale.
PLS RIOT FOR {{champion:62}} underworld Love.

Can some PLEASE tell me why this skin hasn't come back for Harrowing 2015? I started to main {{champion:62}} a few months ago but i wasn't around to buy the skin and i was really hoping to get it this year. Does anyone know when it will actually come back out?
HAHA i thought Reaper {{champion:16}}  was gonna come out during the Harrowing. I WAS SO WRONG.
Is this going to be permanent? Because the Leblanc Skin and the Wukong skin is under the Limited Availability.
i think it's gonna become legacy harrowing after this event ends. Maybe. They were a little unclear about it werent they?

They always make Harrowing skins unavailable after Halloween. But most of the time, you'll see it again next year when the 2015 Harrowing event comes around. They do the same thing with the Christmas themed skins
Wukong wants a banananananananananan {{champion:16}}
Still waiting for a new {{champion:222}} skin.
I like the reference to Edger Allen Poe's "Pit and the Pendulum" in this skin. Wukong's tail is the pendulum :P
{{champion:412}} +{{champion:48}} =new {{champion:62}} ?
As someone who owned all of wukongs skins seeing this this makes me feel like Riot is trying to eat my money like a hurricane sucks in water.
spirit breaker?!

My question is...for a 1350RP, why Wukong? For most 1350 champions, a lot of things are changed and you get all these awesome new particles, etc.


But Wukong has like **nothing** to work with. What makes this a 1350 RP skin?
New voice, new particles, sound animations, recall, death animation. Yeah pretty much everything for a 1350rp skin.
